title: Bloody Muscle Body Builder in Hell
review: It's definitely a Japanese {Evil Dead}, but make no mistake, it's a straight-to-VHS version designed to mimic the western movie with the lowest possible budget. I really enjoyed it, but I can only recommend it to horror nerds who think they've seen it all and want something totally esoteric. Prepare for grainy video, and tiny set filling with with blood and loose rubber body parts.
